column4: When I watch videos, often I see a large strange triangle shaped video distortion in the top right corner.
Has anyone else ever seen that and knows the cause?
It looks like the video has a small delay, but only for a portion of the screen, which happens to be the shape of a triangle. It's a really strange looking effect but happens many times.
no solution from me, but question
I can still see it, but it appears to be ... ... it's like a really strong vsync problem that's triangle shaped. Hard to explain with words. You can see the part of the video but it lags.
